gobblin.aws

Class CloudInitScriptBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.aws.CloudInitScriptBuilder

  • @Alpha
public class CloudInitScriptBuilder
extends Object
    Class to generate script for launching Gobblin cluster master and workers via cloud-init on EC2 instance boot up.

      CloudInitScriptBuilder()

      This method generates the script that would be executed by cloud-init module in EC2 instance upon boot up for GobblinAWSClusterManager.

    • Method Detail

      • buildClusterMasterCommand

        public static String buildClusterMasterCommand(String clusterName,
                                               String nfsParentDir,
                                               String sinkLogRootDir,
                                               String awsConfDir,
                                               String appWorkDir,
                                               String masterS3ConfUri,
                                               String masterS3ConfFiles,
                                               String masterS3JarsUri,
                                               String masterS3JarsFiles,
                                               String masterJarsDir,
                                               String masterJvmMemory,
                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> masterJvmArgs,
                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> gobblinVersion)
        This method generates the script that would be executed by cloud-init module in EC2 instance upon boot up for GobblinAWSClusterManager. This will generate cloud init shell script that does the following: 1. Mount NFS Server (TODO: To be replaced with EFS soon) 2. Create all prerequisite directories 3. Download cluster configuration from S3 4. Download Gobblin application jars from S3 (TODO: To be replaced via baked in jars in custom Gobblin AMI) 5. Download Gobblin custom jars from S3 6. Launch GobblinAWSClusterManager java application 7. TODO: Add cron that watches the GobblinAWSClusterManager application and restarts it if it dies
        Parameters:
        clusterName - Name of the cluster
        nfsParentDir - Directory within which NFS directory should be created and mounted
        sinkLogRootDir - Log sink root directory
        awsConfDir - Directory to save downloaded Gobblin cluster configuration files
        appWorkDir - Gobblin application work directory
        masterS3ConfUri - S3 URI to download cluster configuration files from
        masterS3ConfFiles - Comma separated list of configuration files to download from masterS3ConfUri
        masterS3JarsUri - S3 URI to download Gobblin jar files from
        masterS3JarsFiles - Comma separated list of jar files to download from masterS3JarUri
        masterJarsDir - Directory to save downloaded Gobblin jar files
        masterJvmMemory - Xmx memory setting for Gobblin master java application
        masterJvmArgs - JVM arguments for Gobblin master application
        gobblinVersion - Optional Gobblin version
        Returns:
        Cloud-init script to launch GobblinAWSClusterManager

      • buildClusterWorkerCommand

        public static String buildClusterWorkerCommand(String clusterName,
                                               String nfsParentDir,
                                               String sinkLogRootDir,
                                               String awsConfDir,
                                               String appWorkDir,
                                               String masterPublicIp,
                                               String workerS3ConfUri,
                                               String workerS3ConfFiles,
                                               String workerS3JarsUri,
                                               String workerS3JarsFiles,
                                               String workerJarsDir,
                                               String workerJvmMemory,
                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> workerJvmArgs,
                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> gobblinVersion)
        This method generates the script that would be executed by cloud-init module in EC2 instance upon boot up for GobblinAWSTaskRunner. This will generate cloud init shell script that does the following: 1. Mount NFS volume (TODO: To be replaced with EFS soon) 2. Create all prerequisite directories 3. Download cluster configuration from S3 4. Download Gobblin application jars from S3 (TODO: To be replaced via baked in jars in custom Gobblin AMI) 5. Download Gobblin custom jars from S3 6. Launch GobblinAWSTaskRunner java application 7. TODO: Add cron that watches the GobblinAWSTaskRunner application and restarts it if it dies
        Parameters:
        clusterName - Name of the cluster
        nfsParentDir - Directory within which NFS directory should be created and mounted
        sinkLogRootDir - Log sink root directory
        awsConfDir - Directory to save downloaded Gobblin cluster configuration files
        appWorkDir - Gobblin application work directory
        masterPublicIp - IP of Gobblin cluster worker
        workerS3ConfUri - S3 URI to download cluster configuration files from
        workerS3ConfFiles - Comma separated list of configuration files to download from workerS3ConfUri
        workerS3JarsUri - S3 URI to download Gobblin jar files from
        workerS3JarsFiles - Comma separated list of jar files to download from workerS3JarUri
        workerJarsDir - Directory to save downloaded Gobblin jar files
        workerJvmMemory - Xmx memory setting for Gobblin worker java application
        workerJvmArgs - JVM arguments for Gobblin worker application
        gobblinVersion - Optional Gobblin version
        Returns:
        Cloud-init script to launch GobblinAWSTaskRunner
